executiveSummary: Ali Kinney, founder of Modern Picnic, pitched her line of fashionable, insulated vegan leather lunchboxes on Shark Tank, seeking $400,000 for 6.5% equity. Despite strong sales ($6M cumulative, $2M projected for 2023) and high margins, the Sharks declined to invest due to high marketing spend and lack of profitability.
nextSteps: Ali will continue operating Modern Picnic independently, likely reassessing marketing spend and growth strategies based on feedback from the Sharks.
